metadata.dc:author: Palaoro I, Luis
Rocher C, Adriana
Gatta de N, Claudia
Menghi R, Claudia
Angeleri G, Anabela
metadata.dc:description: The presence of numerous trypomastigote forms of Trypanosoma cruzi in the pleural fluid of a patient with AIDS from Santiago del Estero, Argentina, was detected. Chagas disease is endemic in some countries of Latin America. To our knowledge, the finding of trypomastigote forms of T. cruzi in the pleural fluid has not yet been described in the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Trypanosoma cruzi: tripomastigotes en l√≠quido pleural de un paciente con SIDA.
[Trypanosoma cruzi: trypomastigote forms in pleural fluid of a patient with AIDS].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de infectologia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Chilena de Infectologia
